Detailed Description

The Condition class allows provides a generic interface for all those class that want to provide a command like behviour. This command interfance is implemented by the SIMD_DDS classes providing the condition behaviour. The key advantage of using this command-based approach to condition is that the dispatching can be performed directly and without requiring downcast and other unsafe operations.

Author:
Angelo Corsaro <mailto:angelo.corsaro@gmail.com>
